nycTheatreExcerpt: "With a plot as thin as the paper of a Bible page, Tammy Fayes only hope for salvation would have been some kooky singing and dancing, and yet the show falls short here too."
bwwExcerpt: Opening tonight at Broadwayâ€˜s Palace Theater, with a book by James Graham, lyrics by Jake Shears and music by Elton John, Tammy Faye is only slightly more fun than church on a hot July day. All concerned seem absolutely determined to transform the town madcap into a respectable, saintly and rather dull church-lady-next-door.
